replies.author: HK_Wallace
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HK_Wallace 于 2020-8-14 23:34 编辑 

/papi ecloud download Player
/papi ecloud download Vault
/papi ecloud download PlayerPoints
/papi reload

replies.author: 南柯郡守
replies.txt_content:
是否已经下载了对应的扩展呢

可以尝试使用指令/papi ecloud download <>
来下载对应变量

或者直接到

https://api.extendedclip.com/home/

下载
